services.cta: Got a project in mind? Let’s talk!

process.title: A process that works
process.subtitle: From idea to delivery, I support you every step of the way

step1.title: Initial discussion
step1.description: We discuss your needs, goals, and constraints to fully understand your project

step2.title: Technical proposal
step2.description: I suggest a tailored solution with a detailed quote and delivery schedule

step3.title: Iterative development
step3.description: Short sprints with regular deliverables and feedback points to adjust as needed

step4.title: Delivery & Support
step4.description: Production deployment, training if needed, and ongoing support to ensure success

who.title: Who am I?
who.description: Passionate fullstack developer, I combine technical expertise with a modern vision to create solutions that make a difference. My approach mixes rigor and creativity.

journey.title: My journey
journey.description: Currently a developer at INSEE, I have gained solid experience in creating and maintaining critical systems. In parallel, I use my skills to support innovative projects as a freelancer.

philosophy.title: My philosophy
philosophy.description: I believe in clean, maintainable, and high-performing code. Every project is an opportunity to push boundaries and create something exceptional.

header.name: James ABIB
header.title: Fullstack Developer | Java & TypeScript & Rust
header.description: Software engineer focused on architecture, passionate about clean code and robust systems.
header.experience: {{years}}+ years at INSEE building and maintaining critical systems, and end-to-end delivery of a real client project (Upstra) using microservices/cloud.
header.vision: I bring a modern vision (Rust, cloud, CI/CD), strong team spirit, and the ability to deliver high-quality products, fast.

upstra.period: March 2025 – Present · Freelance (real client, MSc validation)
upstra.description:
Design and development of the Upstra platform (infrastructure management for labs):
Microservices architecture (NestJS DDD/hexagonal), Python (UPS/iLO), Vue 3 frontend.
Docker Compose, modular API, client docs & demo.

insee.description:
Design, development & maintenance of critical APIs (Spring Boot 3, Java 21) + React frontend.
Modernization of data pipelines (Talend → Spring Batch 5.1).
Teamwork on high-impact public solutions.

msc.degree: Expert in Software Development and Architecture
msc.description: Master’s degree in Software Development and Architecture

bsc.description: Bachelor’s degree in Software and Network Project Management

bts.degree: BTS in IT Services for Organizations (SLAM)

codeValley.name: Code Valley
codeValley.description: Social network for developers (like GitHub) with code sharing and execution. Microservices architecture with secure authentication, content management, isolated code execution, and web/mobile interfaces.

frakt.name: Fractal Generator (frakt)
frakt.description: High-performance fractal generator using complex math formulas (Julia, Mandelbrot, Newton-Raphson). Continuous integration and full documentation.

greenItForward.name: GreenItForward
greenItForward.description: Crowdfunding platform for environmental organizations. Enables participatory funding of ecological projects with contribution and impact tracking.
